pros: unique and extensive selection of niche genres (goth/industrial/metal)
good prices and fair rates for buying/selling items
cons: small store size which can limit browsing experience
some reviewers mention limited general music selection
occasional issues with restocking or item availability

notable_quotes.best: I love this place. I've never found another place like it.
notable_quotes.funniest: quite possibly the only person with a mohawk to ever run for mayor

vibe_description: Digital Underground has a cozy, specialized atmosphere that caters to enthusiasts of niche genres. The staff is friendly and knowledgeable, making it easy to find rare or hard-to-find items.
staff_mentions: Reviewers praise the staff for being friendly, helpful, and knowledgeable about specific genres.
event_mentions: Fourth Friday art gala featuring Larry West's art
avante garde musical performances happening locally
recommendation_for: Goth/industrial/metal enthusiasts, gamers with a passion for music, and anyone looking for unique vinyl or CD releases.
